notes.title: Case Study Opportunity
notes.content: Client has agreed to participate in a joint case study showcasing their AI transformation journey. Marketing to coordinate with Marcus Chen's team for testimonial and metrics.

notes.title: APAC Expansion Plans
notes.content: Client planning to expand AI usage to APAC operations (Singapore, Australia, Japan) in H1 2025. Estimated additional contract value: $600K-800K.
